name: 2D Galaxy Shooter
description:
Galaxy Shooter is a game developed by Gabriel Perez for Game Dev HQ's Professional Unity Developer Intensive Program. 

Pilot a lone wolf, armed with a laser, and shoot up many types of enemies that are trying to take you down! Collect various power-ups to give you an edge in space! From stackable shield levels to obtaining missiles and the God's Wish superweapon!

Work your way to the head henchman who gave the order to massacre your entire platoon! It won't be an easy feat! Buckle up, conserve your ammo and outwit your opponents with fluid movement, or else you're going bye-bye. 

If you can last for six waves, I will promote you back in HQ. You'll be living in paradise. 

Well, good luck, Soldier!

------------------------------------------------------

Back to real life, I want to thank everyone who plays it! It will mean a bunch to me!

If you encounter any bugs, please let me know!

---------------------------------------------------------

I want to add extra features when I can. I also want to add support for a gamepad to make it easier for those who aren't fond of keyboards.
